stories.text:
I’ve been wondering what would be the architecture behind such tool. I’m reading about a tiled 2D engine, but what would be the best way to implement that?

I wonder if someone here in HN knows the topic and can suggest articles, books to read, to understand the topic.

Disclaimer: I’m a C++ dev and have experience in computer graphics and web development, so I’m not starting from zero.

stories.text:
Hoping someone can tell me about what it takes to become a professional baker.

Did you go to school for it or learn on the job?

What is the job market like?

Do you consider it a good career?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is Anyone Here a Professional Baker?
